abstract: Policy makers could make adjustments in rates and stimulus measures next month when they get new statistics on the economy.
snippet: Policy makers could make adjustments in rates and stimulus measures next month when they get new statistics on the economy.
lead_paragraph: The Bank of England left its benchmark interest rate and economic support programs unchanged Thursday, opting to wait for stronger recovery signals before following other major central banks in starting to dismantle stimulus measures.

headline.main: Britain’s Central Bank Leaves Key Rate and Stimulus Unchanged
headline.print_headline: Britain’s Central Bank Leaves Key Rate and Stimulus Unchanged

abstract: Bank of America, the biggest lender in the United States, expects to pay record bonuses to some investment bankers while keeping the overall cost of incentive compensation below previous years, a company spokesman said.
snippet: Bank of America, the biggest lender in the United States, expects to pay record bonuses to some investment bankers while keeping the overall cost of incentive compensation below previous years, a company spokesman said.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America, the biggest lender in the United States, expects to pay record bonuses to some investment bankers while keeping the overall cost of incentive compensation below previous years, a company spokesman said, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Big Bonuses at BofA, but Overall Pool Stays Level
